title: Goddess Julia Roberts celebrates 52nd birthday as celebrity pals chime in
text:
Julia has turned 52 (Picture: Instagram/Getty Images)

Julia Roberts made sure to celebrate her 52nd birthday the more simple way – by taking a trip outdoors, of course.

Yep, rather than celebrating with an extravagant birthday party, the actress instead opted to enjoy herself with a birthday rodeo instead.

Taking to Instagram, Julia shared a snap of her looking stylish and ready for winter as she donned a cosy black and white striped jacket paired with a bandana-style scarf.

’52. Yeehaw,’ she captioned the post, alongside birthday cake and dancer emojis.

And among the celebrity pals on hand to wish the star well on her special day in the comments included fellow actresses Rita Wilson and Jennifer Aniston.

‘Happy Birthday!’ Rita began her comment. ‘I think you transposed the numbers.

‘It’s 25, right? Love you!!!’

To which Julia jokingly replied: ‘Yes, 25. Love you Rita.’

Julia looked ready for winter in her getup (Picture: Instagram)

‘Happy birthday beauty!!’ Jennifer wrote, while Julia replied: ‘Love you Jen,’ adding a heart emoji to her comment.

Julia’s niece, Emma Roberts, also later took to Instagram to pay tribute to her aunt, sharing a snap of the two.

‘Happy birthday Aunt @juliaroberts, you are the queen!’ she said. ‘I love you.’

‘I love you beyond measure,’ Julia replied.

It is likely that Julia celebrated her birthday alongside husband Danny Moder and their three children, 14-year-old twins Hazel and Phinnaeus, and Henry, 12.

She previously spoke about celebrating turning 50 back in 2017, which involved her being surprised by her husband with a special party, and her kids were in on the whole thing too – even though she had been told they were all playing football games.

‘That was 50, and it was so beautiful and wonderful,’ she told Harper’s Bazaar. ‘I could burst into tears thinking about it.

‘They had me tricked me so completely. There was no soccer game. Even these friends of ours who were texting me scores of games, everybody was in on it, and it was so incredible and beautiful.’

Here’s to wishing Julia a happy birthday!
